output_list.criticism: The transfer function does not check if the value being transferred is greater than the sender's balance, which can lead to an integer overflow if the sender has insufficient balance.
The _transfer function does not check if the value being transferred is greater than the sender's balance, which can lead to an integer overflow if the sender has insufficient balance.
The transferFrom function does not check if the value being transferred is greater than the sender's balance, which can lead to an integer overflow if the sender has insufficient balance.
The approveAndCall function does not check if the value being approved is greater than the sender's balance, which can lead to an integer overflow if the sender has insufficient balance.
The burn function does not check if the value being burned is greater than the sender's balance, which can lead to an integer overflow if the sender has insufficient balance.
